QuestData.Title: Jurrix the Striker
QuestData.Description: Oh, you want to talk? Fine.$b$bI'm Jurrix, the only merc here with half a brain. The only one with any bite to my attacks, too. The only reason I keep these meat shields around is to keep myself from getting killed.$b$bListen, you're the boss of this operation. You give the word, and I'll send a fireball right through your target's heart. If things start getting hectic, I can even warp time a bit so you can fit in a few extra attacks.$b$bWhy don't we go try fighting together?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Jurrix's Fiery Blast and Jurrix's Time Warp.
QuestData.CompletionText: We're not quite ready yet. A little more practice, then we'll get with the dragon-slaying.
QuestData.RewardText: I think you're ready, $n. You're getting the hang of this.
